General.Description: EOS.IO is software introducing a blockchain architecture that is designed to allow for vertical and horizontal deployment of hierarchical applications. This is achieved through an operating system architecture like those that can be built. The software provides accounts, authentication, databases, asynchronous communications and scheduling applications on multiple CPU cores and/or clusters.
General.Features: The first feature, SCALABLE: Supports thousands of DApps Commercial Scale; Parallel processing; Asynchronous communication; Separation of authentication from execution. The second, SCOPE: Freezing and Repairing Broken Applications; Rights based on general roles. Finally, USABLE: Web Development Kit for Interface Development; Self-explanatory interface; Self-describing database schema; Declarative permission scheme.
General.Technology: The resulting technology is a blockchain architecture capable of expanding to millions of transactions per second, eliminating user fees and enabling rapid and easy deployment of hierarchies.
General.Sponsor: EOS is sponsored by CryptoFund. This is an organization that includes investment fund trades and invests in ICOs.
